name: The Truth (potato)
description:
The truth, a  short pixel art game made in gdevelop. although being short I made four endings for the game and an achievement system! 

controls: 

arrow keys to move around 

and the space bar to interact.

can you uncover the truth?

spoilers questions:

how is this related to the theme: there are two ways you can think of it the first way is the player trying to protect the girl and the second way, is the bear trying to protect the girl.

did you use any free assets or sounds? I didn't use any free assets, but I did use free sounds: 

fesliyanstudios (knocking sound effect)

GFX Sounds  (body fall sound)

Motion Array (metal sound)

team members:

potato from discord. (creator)

 and @auroras_arto from Instagram. (cutscene artist)

cheers                                                                                                                                                                                -potato
